location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Henry Wood, Acting Civil Auditor, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the account disbursements and vouchers (not present) for the Bushire Residency for October, November and December 1810. It notes that a charge has been made for the tents and explains that this expense has been unavoidable due to the factory being uninhabitable; the charge will cease once accommodation is available for the Residency.
